Mercator Tiles

Source: R/bt_functions.R
bt_tiles.Rd

Mercator Tiles

Usage

bt_tiles(bertin, style, zoomDelta, tileSize, opacity, ...)

Arguments

bertin

map object

style

tile style

zoomDelta

zoom offset

tileSize

tile size

opacity

tile opacity

...

other param

Value

map object

Examples

library(sf)
world <- st_read(system.file("gpkg/world.gpkg", package = "bertin"),
                 layer = "world", quiet = TRUE)
italy <- world[world$name == "Italy",]
bt_param(projection = "Mercator", clip = TRUE, extent = italy) |>
  bt_tiles(style = "worldphysical") |>
  bt_draw()
